resources.string:
The existence of Kampung Dago Pojok in Dago Village, Coblong Subdistrict cannot be separated from the figure of a local artist named Rahmat Jabaril. Rahmat is a young man who has a high sense of appreciation for art. Several years ago, he was concerned that he saw the village where he lived less developed.
Starting from this, plus his love of art, Rahmat then tried to innovate by beautifying the walls and streets of the village. The various murals, pictures and paintings he created. As a result, Dago Pojok began to be famous as an art village and attracted tourists to come.

Setelah 1 minggu berlibur di raja ampat rasa nya ingin segera kembali karena teringat dengan kenangan kengang kenangan lama disana banyak tempat tempat indah yang sangat memanjakan mata ku ini kuharap bisa kmebali kesana
